features: PACKAGING MAY VARY: Every package of WaterWipes XL Bathing Wipes still contains the same pure and trusted water-based wipes.
PURE, SIMPLE FORMULA: Our fragrance-free XL Bathing Wipes gently clean and help protect baby’s delicate skin with just 2 ingredients: 99.9% purified water and a drop of fruit extract.

IDEAL FOR A FULL BODY CLEAN: Our soft, textured, hypoallergenic extra-large wet wipes are bigger than standard wipes and are ideal for gently cleaning and helping protect sensitive skin- for a rinse-free, nose to toes clean.
PLANT-BASED, HYPOALLERGENIC WIPES: Our Original baby wipes are plant-based and plastic-free. Plus, they're hypoallergenic, unscented, and contain no artificial fragrances, parabens or sulfates.

TRUSTED BY DERMATOLOGISTS: Suitable for eczema-prone skin and allergy sufferers, WaterWipes are accepted by the National Eczema Association of America, Dermatologically Approved by the Skin Health Alliance and registered by the Vegan Society.

MORE EVERYDAY USES: WaterWipes are versatile for adults, pets, and surfaces too. These disposable wet wipes are ideal for cleaning small messes, refreshing skin, and wiping pets' paws, making them a convenient travel essential for on-the-go use.
body.description: Families can trust WaterWipes XL Bathing Wipes 16 Count (1 Pack) to gently clean and help protect sensitive skin. Our new Plastic-Free XL Bathing Baby Wipes are the same formula and purity as before, with just 2 ingredients: 99.9% ultra-purified water and a drop of fruit extract to naturally cleanse the skin. Our purified water goes through a 7-step process that makes it purer than tap, boiled or medical grade water to provide a deeper, more effective clean.* Our WaterWipes are unscented, hypoallergenic and gentle enough for the most sensitive premature, infant and newborn skin. WaterWipes was created by a father, inspired by a daughter. Our founder developed WaterWipes after his newborn suffered from bad diaper rash, and he realized skin this pure needs care that’s just as pure. So, he created the world’s purest wipes to help protect his child and help other parents do the same for theirs. Now families around the world trust pure and simple WaterWipes for all kinds of messes. These plastic-free wipes are gentle on the planet, and they’re clinically proven to be kind on baby’s skin, giving parents the confidence to help protect their children in the purest way possible. *When compared to cloth and water.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: extra large wipes Our soft XL Bathing wipes are ideal for gently cleaning and helping to protect sensitive skin—from nose to toes—while leaving no greasy residue. same quality and purity WaterWipes are now plant-based† and plastic-free*. They're the same formula and size as our previous wipes. accredited and accepted brand We're proud that our wipes have been accredited and accepted as gentle and effective at cleaning sensitive skin by many global organizations. pure and simple ingredients While other wipes have as many as 12 ingredients, WaterWipes XL Bathing Wipes are made using only 99.9% purified water and a drop of fruit extract.

Previous page explore your choices All WaterWipes Products Our range of wipes gently clean and help protect sensitive skin of all ages...for all occasions. explore your choices Original Baby Wipes Our gentle, soothing wipes are ideal for the most sensitive premature, infant and newborn skin. explore your choices Textured Clean Wipes Designed for growing babies, these wipes are specially textured to tackle tougher messes. explore your choices XL Bathing Wipes Our textured, extra-large wipes are perfect for a rinse-free full body clean. Next page 1 All WaterWipes Products 2 Original Baby Wipes 3 Textured Clean Wipes 4 XL Bathing Wipes

Plant-based† and plastic-free* We believe in taking small steps to help protect the planet your little one will inherit. WaterWipes are now made from 100% viscose, a natural wood pulp fiber that is plant-based† and plastic free*. †Wipe made from regenerated cellulose (viscose) utilizing wood pulp as a precursor. purified water for a deeper, more effective clean* Water is nature’s natural cleanser and moisturizer. WaterWipes’ unique 7-step purification process lowers the surface tension of our water, resulting in a deeper clean.* *When compared to cloth and water.

Are WaterWipes the same as previous WaterWipes? We haven’t made any changes to WaterWipes, apart from removing the plastic from the wipe material itself. Now all our wipes are plant-based† and plastic-free*, while offering the same level of comfort on your baby’s delicate skin. How do I dispose of my WaterWipes products? Our wipes are made from plant fibers, so they can be disposed of in your home composting bin or your organic waste bin that is collected and sent for industrial composting. Wipes used for diaper changes should be disposed of with general waste. Are WaterWipes flushable? No, you should never flush any wipes. When should I dispose of my WaterWipes? Because WaterWipes contain minimal ingredients and are now made from 100% viscose, a plant-based† material, our wipes are best used within 4 weeks of opening. †Wipe made from regenerated cellulose (viscose) utilizing wood pulp as a precursor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For sensitive skin on your little!
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommend! These wipes are gentle on little children's skin and the scent is light. I use this to freshen up if your babe doesn't like bath time every day. This is a wonderful, gentle alternative.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the Size
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these to take with me when I was traveling. I love the size and the moisture content is great! If you have small children or not, these would definitely come in handy when you’re on the go!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THE SIZE IS AMAZING
reviews.reviewText: I'm obsessed with these - and have them in all of my "mom bags". I've used the regular water wipes since my oldest was born (4) and love them - but the fact that these are four times the size means I can use them easily to wipe the girls down when we get into the car from an adventure without having to go through a pack. It's a fantastic design and I love the option!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for makeup removal
reviews.reviewText: I use these wipes for my makeup removal. Even without cleansing oil, these wipes are great. Because of the size, I only use 1 or 2 wipes to remove a full face of makeup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love these bathing wipes
reviews.reviewText: Love these wipes for my newborn, especially since its been so cold lately. these are great between bathing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: The wipe itself is a great size and very convenient when you don’t have access to a full shower/would like to freshen up without showering. Mainly used it for my baby in between bath nights, especially in her groin and neck area. My baby did not get rashes, and didn’t experience any redness when we used it. Dropped down 1 star because it says you should use all the wipes in about 14 days after opening the package. We were able to use it until 30 days after opening, but I was very careful to make sure that I was sealing the packet completely. I wish they had bigger packs!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe for Sensitive Skin
reviews.reviewText: I have a lot of allergies, so I need something that does not have a fragrance, and is not full of chemicals that will hurt my skin. This passes the test with me. It is very hard to find something that I do not react to. I do wish the individual wipes were more substantial. However, the wipe like that cause me problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for in between bath nights!
reviews.reviewText: My 2 yr old has eczema and bathing every night exacerbates it so he bathes every other night. These are great for the in between bath nights. One sheet does the job. Keeps him comfortable and fresh.
Good to have around to wipe your hands after picking blackberry's. They are large enough to completely wipe your hands clean.

I love these XL water wipes. They are perfect for cleaning up big messes and being able to wipe down your whole baby with one wipe. Very useful in the car and at mealtime! I just wish they came in larger quantities

reviews.reviewTitle: Amazing wipes when you don't have water.
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to use on a camping trip and it did the job. The wipes are large and was more than enough to wipe down one child with one wipe. Wanting to avoid using the facilities at the campsite these did the job. They were super moist and had no scent or leftover residue. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: No perfume, good for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I have a few skin disease and was looking for something to clean it without irritating my skin. These wipes are perfect, they are big and really soaked so you have more than enough product on them. Would 100% recommend.
